body: Can you clarify what the problem is? Are you saying TensorFlow is only using the 1080 Ti, even though you additionally have a GTX titan? If that is the case, you can use `tf.device(...)` to specify which GPU to use, see the [Using GPUs](https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/using_gpu) tutorial.
